name: Hair Nightmare
description:
Hair Nightmare!

Your friend's hair is out of control! Let's trim it into something a little more manageable for her, shall we? Not too long, not too short, just right. :)

Made in 48hrs by Meg and Andrew Armstrong for GMTK Jam 2020, Theme: "Out of Control". <3

"R" to restart, "M" to mute. "Enter" to save your photo at the end.

Be sure to leave a rating! https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/694561

//

Made in GameMaker Studio 2. SFX from Freesound.org Creative Commons. Music made in Figure app. Art made in Adobe Illustrator.
